title: silver ranked but plat like suport skills lol
body: hello I am currently a support main all I play is support unless I have to fill I am currently ranked silver 4 but I have been gold 2 I have been playing for 3 seasons and im keen to join a team who is keen to climb maybe 1 day hit chlanger I own all support champs please add my main account zeroakellyz if you would like me to try out for your team I play everyday unless I have something planed but normaly pumping out 10/15 games a day

replies.body: That's funny I'm diamond ranked with bronze support skills, maybe we should swap
its hard to climb maining support lol I need to find a good duo adc main and should be alright
